mapper.select: select c.*, u.nickname, u.face_img, u.face_img_thumb from nuoquan.user_article_comment c left join nuoquan.user u on c.from_user_id = u.id where c.article_id = #{articleId} and c.father_comment_id is null order by c.create_date desc
